  VlnPlot(all10x, features.plot='BARX1', point.size.use = -1, group.by='sample_name', x.lab.rot=T, size.x.use = 8),
  VlnPlot(all10x, features.plot='LINC01116', point.size.use = -1, group.by='sample_name', x.lab.rot=T, size.x.use = 8),
  labels='auto', ncol=1
